StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetSmcrUnitList]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@zipCodes xml = null
AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF @ZipCodes IS NOT null BEGIN DECLARE @ZipCodesTable TABLE (ID varchar(5)) INSERT INTO @ZipCodesTable (ID) SELECT ParamValues.ID.value('.','VARCHAR(5)') FROM @ZipCodes.nodes('ZipCodes/id') as ParamValues(ID) END
SELECT [SMCRReserveUnitID] ,[SMCRReserveUnitName] ,[Street1] ,[City] ,[State] ,[ZipCode] FROM [USMC].[SMCRReserveUnit] WHERE ( @ZipCodes is null OR LEFT(ZIPCODE,5) IN (SELECT * FROM @ZipCodesTable) ) ORDER BY SMCRReserveUnitName ;
END
